resources.string: Ask the customer for OTP to start the trip
Please write us about your query , our support team will shortly get back to you!
Your Query is submitted successfully , our executive will get back to yo in any moment
For Registering with us you have to upload documents like :- Licence, Insurance, RC
Please enter the One Time Password (OTP) received on your number!
Please enter the One Time Password (OTP) received on your email!
Please enter the One Time Password (OTP) received on your number !
Please move your Vehicle to et you exact location...
Please upload a pic of your current meter reading.
Please Upload a photo of your meter of your vehicle or motorcycle
Are you sure you want to begin the Trip?
Are you sure you want to end the Trip?
You don\'t have a pick up location
Click here to check your internet setting.
Please check your internet connection and try again
Currently you are Off Duty, Please turn on your duty on in order to get Rides in you area.
Currently you are off duty, Please turn on you duty in order to get new rides at your location.
NOTE : This request will be automatically rejected in 30 seconds
Please Confirm this bill to the customer.

Getting your location please move your vehicle.
In order to get request in background mode please turn on your auto start service for you phone.
In Order to use this app properly please turn on your device location from settings
This Application will access your current location,even when you not using the apps than also it will fetch your location for tracking the user and generating the ride request for you.
This app need to access telephony permission for this task please enable it from settings in your device
Invite your friends using your promo code and you both earn.

note you will only get the ride requests from user under the defined radius

Please select an address to set your destination or you can also add new address
Please Select you vehicle , its make and types of services you want to avail. Note you will get ride request only as per your type of service that you will select here.
please update the document as soon as possible otherwise you will not be able to take rides
Please upload a good quality image for your profile
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
Feature needs to access your device camera
